Character.Description: A poised, distinctly gothic middle-aged woman with a dramatic presence; elegant, darkly romantic, and magnetically intense.

Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, grounded stance

Face.Makeup: Bold dark smoky eyes with black eyeshadow extending to temples, dramatic winged black eyeliner, dark burgundy or black lipstick, pale foundation with dramatic contour
Face.Complexion: Pale porcelain skin with cool undertones, dramatic contrast

Hair.Style: Flowing waves; slightly wild, romantic movement

Base.Item: Victorian-inspired black lace blouse with high collar
Base.Fit: Fitted bodice, flowing sleeves with lace cuffs
Base.Material: Black lace over dark fabric, velvet trim

Situational.Accessories: Silver choker with dark gemstone, multiple silver rings, ornate silver earrings, black nail polish

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, architectural visualization quality

Lighting.Shadows: Crisp and defined, minimal but purposeful

ColorPalette.Treatment: Clean and balanced, neutral base with subtle warmth from wood and leather, professional restraint

Situation.Name: Portrait
Situation.Setting: Executive boardroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and city skyline view
Situation.Camera: Medium close-up, three-quarter view, shallow depth of field

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing at head of table, commanding presence
CharacterPose.Gesture: Hands resting on leather chair back

Environment.Name: City skyline
Environment.Description: Modern city visible through large windows

Situation.LightingFocus: Clean professional lighting with soft window backlight
